Rules: Every time you go to the gym, choose a Famous Workout. Change workouts every time. Always set the weight to your personal best and then break it.
Arnold Schwarzenegger
Exercise Sets x Reps
Bench Press 3 x 10
Incline Bench Press 3 x 10
Bent Over Rows 3 x 10
Chin Ups 3 x 10
Crunches 5 x 25
Standing Barbell Curls 3 x 10
Seated Dumbbell Curls 3 x 10
Wrist Curls 3 x 10
Reverse Wrist Curls 3 x 10
Crunches 5 x 10
